name: DrifTeam
description:
Turn Gamepad on before game starts
Click on the game to get the focus

If you experience slowdowns be sure you are using the primary GPU, not integrated, test in other browsers or download, it's available for Win/mac/linux.

Gamepad Brake: LT
Accelerate: RT
Steer: Left Analog Joystick

My Record for reference:
5.233 (Without touch grass)

TIP:
Grass decreases speed but taking a bit at good moments can give you better time.
